website_summaries.verdict: The Acoustic Research Universal Smart Remote works well once you've managed to set it up, but it cannot replace the easy-to-use experience with that of a Harmony remote.
pros: handy program guide displayed on built-in color screen
click365 service delivers weather, sports, and news straight to remote
cons: Device and activity setup is rough
remote is overly large and not terribly ergonomic
Wi-Fi features could've been better integrated into device setup

customer_reviews.title: Waste.
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money it doesn’t go online anymore. Don’t bother with it.
customer_reviews.author: MEbe

customer_reviews.title: The true experience with the Acoustic Reseach ARRU449 Universal Smart Remote Control.
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion of the Acoustic ARRU449 Universal Smart Remote Control simply to say it deserves an A grade on a scale of 1 to 10 because it is the most compatible high tech device that i could ever hope for and likewise because of its professional design and high tech quality of ease to work with the controls endlessly no question without a dowt.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Q

customer_reviews.title: don't buy, don't buy, don't buy
customer_reviews.text: The guide service and other options such as weather with 365tv have been discontinued. It was awesome having the guide on the remote and picking the channel to go straight to it. Now it is just another universal remote. I have three in my house. The kids are pretending they are play telephones. Booooooo to AR for not keeping this service running and booooo to Amazon for still having it as a feature.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: No support.
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived I was excited to get it out of the package and start tinkering with it. Only when i got it powered up I found out there was no more support for all web based features this remote was supposed to have.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Sciano

customer_reviews.title: Universal Smart Remote
customer_reviews.text: This product is great as long as you have a Linksys router to create a wireless internet network in your home so your remote can connect to the internet. Only problem with this remote is you constantly have to recharge it too much. I guess sometimes I didn't have my charger plugged in correctly so it might just seem that way to me because it didn't recharge well enough, but the remote takes alot of power to run and ends up needing to be recharged every night or maybe once every 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Scott T. Martin

customer_reviews.title: depressing product....
customer_reviews.text: WHY EXPRESSING ALL THE FRUSTRATION IN 1000 WORDS. THIS THING JUST DON'T WORK, YOU CAN EXCHANGE 1000 TIMES AND STILL WON'T DO WHAT YOU WOULD EXPECT FROM A REMOTE CONTROL...
customer_reviews.author: L. andrade

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. Out of the box, the control could not handle 1) my cable box, 2) my audio processor, 3) my Blue Ray Disk player. Honestly, a complete waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: reliability a major issue
customer_reviews.text: I have now had 3 ARRU449 remotes. I do not use them as hockey pucks. They simply work for awhile and then fail. Trying to get them replaced is equal to the reliability of the unit. Both are losers! In defense of the unit, set up is a breeze and when it works it is wonderful. In addition it allows you to access the internet for the TV programs in your area. Would I get another one - well hopefully Acoustic Research will send one but otherwise no way. I would look for a unit with better reliability
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never Again
customer_reviews.text: Not bad out of the box, paid $[...] from [...] but noticed a few things: Initial setup for the devices not bad, required a few tweaks. Then programmed activities, such as watch tv, dvd, etc. Well every week, I find myself reprogramming the activities Secondly the wifi is intermittent at best. Every wireless device in the house connects, but not this device. Also the email function (reading) fails constantly. Finally the small buttons and off-balance feel took some getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: RobRoy

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy - Acoustic Research abandoned customers
customer_reviews.text: The main feature, wifi connectivity (click365), has not worked in well over a year. As a result, there are no guides, program descriptions, or anything else that relies on the internet. Acoustic Research never replaced the site and ignored all requests for help from current owners of this remote. Acoustic Research has lost a customer for life for their "not my problem" attitude. Quite sad really.
customer_reviews.author: Music Seeker

customer_reviews.title: AR Rules in wifi remotes, move it over Logitech
customer_reviews.text: Awesome,awesome and then some. Was a Harmony guy after hunting and hunting for the right one, thought I found it till I stumbled on this remote. I don't see Logitech going wifi and wifi really puts this over the top as far as I'm concerned. Weather,messaging,games geez it's beyond a smart remote it's more like a smart phone for your electronic devices. Get it ,it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: sucks
customer_reviews.text: The wireless NIC inside the remote would never connect to any wireless network. The setup for devices is difficult and the ergonomics are terrible. It's almost impossible to use this remote with one hand and still access the necessary buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip L. Farris

customer_reviews.title: Good remote
customer_reviews.text: This is a good remote. Because of the wireless feature you can see the channel guide on it's screen. Easy to set up. Only flaw is that this is a rechargeable remote and if it dies you have to reset the thing. Not a big hassle but something you have to be aware of.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Nick

product_meta.title: Acoustic Research ARRU449 Universal Smart Remote Control (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
Universal learning WiFi remote with 365 degree environment and seamless wireless update.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Sometimes less is more. Let’s face it, no matter what the device there’s seemingly a remote for it. And with today’s advanced home theater systems, operating any one of them can be frustrating. The Acoustic Research Universal Smart Remote makes controlling it all simple. By doing most of the work for you. It automatically detects device codes, so programming it to work with your TV, DVD player or stereo receiver is a breeze. It provides easy, one-touch commands like Turn on Bedroom DVR or Watch Den Satellite, so switching between components takes seconds. Plus, with built-in WiFi capability, it even gives you instant access to news, weathers, sports and program guides through Click365 services. All on a 2.2" full-color LCD screen. Home entertainment will never be the same. 


Easiest to Set Up: No need to connect remote to your computer or access a web wizard. The Universal Smart Remote walks you through setup…wirelessly. All you need to know is the brand of each device you want to set up. And there’s a Help button with tips to get the most from your home theater systems. Easy to Use: Familiar user-friendly remote functionality with point-and-select menus for one-button commands. Switching between components takes seconds. Programming one-touch activities like "Watch TV" or "Watch DVD" couldn’t be easier. Program Guides…On the Remote: Your own personal guide to what’s on. The Universal Smart Remote’s LCD screen shows you schedules for all your program providers—you can even set up favorite channels and shows for each member of your family. News, Weather and Sports, Just a Click Away: Press the remote’s click365 button and voila… click365 services beams the latest news, weather and sports info to your Universal Smart Remote’s LCD screen via your internet connection and WiFi network. Always Updating Automatically: The Universal Smart Remote keeps up with the times. New device? No problem, we’ve got your code. Your program guides also stay current with multiple updates every day.
feature_bullets: Receive electronic program guide, news, weather and sports directly to your remote
Channel surf by viewing program guide on the remote without disturbing current viewers
Learning remote provides customization of new devices and controls virtually unlimited devices or activities
WiFi smart code library works with all types of TVs, cables boxes etc.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.5 out of 5 stars23 ratings2.5 out of 5 stars
